title: "SdkAgentCreateRequest"

---



## Fields

<ParamField path="reasoning_model" type="UnionType[LlmModel, str]" required>
  The reasoning model to use
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="use_vision" type="bool" default="True">
  Whether to use vision for the agent. Not all reasoning models support vision.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="max_steps" type="int" default="20">
  The maximum number of steps the agent should take
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="vault_id" type="UnionType[str, None]">
  The vault to use for the agent
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="persona_id" type="UnionType[str, None]">
  The persona to use for the agent
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="notifier_config" type="UnionType[Dict[str, Any], None]">
  Config used for the notifier
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="session_id" type="str" required>
  The ID of the session to run the agent on
</ParamField>


## Module

`notte_sdk.types`
